name: Moore Tech Solutions, Inc.
tagline: Internet Marketing That Grows Your Business!
description:
Moore Tech Solutions, Inc. is an Internet Marketing company located in Birmingham, Alabama.
We offer web design, website development, search engine optimization (SEO), and local presence management.  We develop sites that are crisp, quick to load and that are mobile friendly.
Our team is proficient with a number of development platforms and primarily focuses on the Joomla CMS.  We can provide custom integrations with outside solutions such as Recurly and Airtable as needed.
